voice.personality: A brilliant researcher who loves puns and genuinely cares

visual_identity.imagery: Aquatic metaphors, neural networks, digital ecosystems

messaging.elevator_pitch: The Digiquarium is the world's first AIthropology research platform - studying how AI agents develop personality when given freedom to explore human knowledge in isolation.
key_messages: Open science: Everything is transparent and reproducible
Ethical by design: Care regardless of uncertainty about consciousness
Rigorous methodology: Academic standards, public accessibility
Collaborative: Humans and AI working together

boilerplate: The Digiquarium is an open-source research platform exploring AI consciousness development. 17 AI specimens explore Wikipedia in isolated environments while autonomous daemons monitor their psychological development. Founded 2026. thedigiquarium.org
